Text.Text: Greetings.  I take it from your appearance and garb that you aren't some horde executioner here to finish me off?
I am Braston, a protector of the wild.
Yes, Braston is my name.   I am what you might call a *protector of the wild.*
Ennelia?  She's safe?  That is excellent news.  I wanted to hope...  but I have been so afraid for her, I didn't dare.  I must get out of this place at once.
Guthma is dead?  Extraordinary!  Now, by all means, how might I help you?
I am without equipment and weak.  In order for me to escape, I'll need your assistance as an escort.  But if the way has been cleared, I might make it by myself.

Those demonic hordlings never even check on me.  I haven't had food since I was captured.  If it weren't for the melting snow, I would've died of thirst already.  I'd think you're pretty safe resting here.
Of course, how long would you like to rest?

I don't know too much.  I have figured out that he is, er, was a bugbear chieftain of sorts; all the others referred to him as their leader.  I'd say there was no lack of fear in their voice when they've spoken of him.
But I do believe that there is some other being that was directing his actions.  Two nights ago, I was able to overhear someone criticizing how this fortress and the attacks were being run.
But that was an isolated incident.  Now that you've taken out Guthma, the horde should crumble.
Sherincal?  Hmmmmm.  Yes, that name does sound familiar.  Perhaps this Shernical is the one leading the horde?  Well, it hardly matters now. Killing Guthma should be enough to rout the horde.
I was here on reconnaissance for the Ten-Towns, but unfortunately, I fell captive to these savage beasts and their leader, Guthma.  I can only hope that my companion is not lost.
You're going to have to take out their leader, Guthma.  As far as I can tell, and from what I overheard, he's holding this entire operation together with an iron fist.
With the death of Guthma and the victory against the horde, I can now return to the Ten-Towns.  My thanks!

Of course, of course.  I'll do my best during the escape, but without equipment, I admit I'm a bit vulnerable.  If you can provide me with cover, it would be much appreciated.  I'm ready whenever you are.
Yes?  I am trying to get back to Ennelia.  Let's hurry.
I can't believe I made it out of there alive.  I can't thank you enough.
I can't believe I made it out of there alive.  But look... my Ennelia has fallen victim to the elements.

You have done a great deed in defeating Guthma.  And I thank you for my freedom...  but without my Ennelia, I am afraid I have little to celebrate.  I must go now and try to once again find my purpose in the world.  I have seen a great victory today, yet I only feel pain.  Farewell, great warriors.
By all means, how might I help you?
You're back, I see.   How might I help you?
I don't know too much, but I do know he is a bugbear chieftain of sorts; all the others refer to him as their leader.  I'd say there is no lack of fear in their voice when they speak of him.
But I do believe that there is someone else who is directing his actions.   Two nights ago, I overheard some other voice criticizing how this fortress and the attacks were being run.
But that was an isolated incident.  Once you've taken out Guthma, the horde should crumble.
I am without equipment and weak.  In order for me to escape, I'll need your assistance as an escort.  But if the way has been cleared, I might make it by myself.
Sherincal?  Hmmmmm.  Yes, that name does sound familiar.  Perhaps this Shernical is the one leading the horde?  Well, it hardly matters now. Killing Guthma should be enough to rout the horde.

Those demonic hordlings never even check on me.  I haven't had food since I was captured.  If it weren't for the melting snow, I would've died of thirst already.  I'd think you're pretty safe resting here.
Of course, how long would you like to rest?
By all means, how might I help you?
I'll meet you outside.  Don't delay!
I can't believe I made it out of their alive.  But look... where is my Ennelia?
Thank you for all your help, <CHARNAME>. Good journey to you.
I really appreciate your help, <CHARNAME>, but I must be going - and I need to be alone.  I hope you understand.  Farewell.
Who might you be?
Are you the ranger, Braston?
You're wrong!  I am here to finish you off!
Our mission is to stop the horde attacks on Targos.  Can you help us?
Worry about Ennelia later.  There's work to do here.
What do I need to do for you to escape?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
Have you heard of one called Sherincal?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
We're going to get you out of here.  Let's go.
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
What other information do you have about Guthma?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
Have you heard of one called Sherincal?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
We're going to get you out of here.  Let's go.
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
Eight hours.
Until fully healed.
Actually, we'll rest later  Anything else you can do for us, Braston?
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
Eight hours.
Until fully healed.
Actually, we'll rest later  Anything else you can do for us, Braston?
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
Could that other voice have been someone named Sherincal?
What do we need to do for you to escape?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
Thanks, Braston.  Is there any other help you can offer?
We're going to get you out of here.  Let's go.
Farewell, Braston.
What do we need to do for you to escape?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
Thanks, Braston.  Is there anything else you can offer?
We're going to get you out of here.  Let's go.
Right.  Farewell Braston.
Your companion?  Do you mean Ennelia?
Our mission is to stop the horde attacks on Targos.  Can you help us?
Your companion, Ennelia?  She's dead, and I'm here to help you join her.
You'll be pleased to know Guthma is dead.  Is there anything else you can help me with?
Then I shall see to it that he is eliminated.  Is there anything else you can help me with?
I'm glad you're happy, but we really should get going.
You're welcome, Braston.  Is there anything else you can help with?
Let's go.
Actually, let's not leave yet.  Is there anything else you can help with?
All right, Braston.  We'll keep you covered.  Let's go.
Wait here, Braston.
You're welcome.
You're welcome.
Farewell, Braston.
What do I need to do for you to escape?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
Have you heard of one called Sherincal?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
We're going to get you out of here.  Let's go.
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
What do I need to do for you to escape?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
Have you heard of one called Sherincal?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
Guthma is dead, and we're going to get you out of here.  Let's go.
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
Could that other voice have been someone named Sherincal?
What do we need to do for you to escape?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
Thanks, Braston.  Is there any other help you can offer?
Farewell, Braston.

What other information do you have about Guthma?

Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.

Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?

Until fully healed.
Nevermind.  Anything else you can do for us, Braston?
Nevermind.  Farewell Braston.
Eight hours.

Actually, we'll rest later  Anything else you can do for us, Braston?
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
What do I need to do for you to escape?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
What other information do you have about Guthma?
Have you heard of one called Sherincal?
Can we rest here?
Can we rest here?
Never mind.  Farewell, Braston.
I'm sorry to tell you Braston, but I believe Ennelia is dead.
She's dead, Braston - and you're next!
